title: Character Creation
content: - Choose from a variety of Style options, then modify the colour-- as well as piercing styles. Eyes: Modify the colour of your character's eyes and be able to toggle Heterochromia from this menu, which allows players to select two different eye colours, one for each eye. Makeup Hair: Players will be able to switch out the character's Hairstyle and modify the Hair Colour, Highlights, and Greying of the hair.
